Articles.Content:
I don't know what I did but I now have no assigned crew at all in any ships I try to fly or build (playing in sandbox mode). All the kerbal appear in the astronaut building and it shows 4 assigned those 4 but they do not appear on ships. I can assign other crew but those original 4 assigned remain gone.  My ksp.log looks all weird but I don't know how to post it here. Please help

*** Moderator Snip ***

*** Unfortunately, I had to remove the embedded log. They can cause serious problems with browsers, making it impossible for some people to view your post. Please refer to the thread How To Get Support (READ FIRST) for instructions on how to present logs.

Many thanks and apologies.

 

Output Log

 

Jeez nevermind.  Went to Tracking Building and recovered my ships and got the Kerbals back. Man I am one Kerbal dumb ass. If the Mod wants, I have no problem deleting this dumb thread.

Edited January 12, 2018 by MikeO89
Embedded log has been removed.
